message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering its exceptional quality and rarity.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in it. However, given my current budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1500000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll counteroffer at $1350000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your initial offer. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
